column1: Station number was 2687 but changed in Jan 1933 when county boundary moved and gauge went from Derbyshire to West Riding
1940 Jan 3.22, Feb 2.93 and total estimated thus removed
1941 Jan 4.85, Feb 4.65 and total estimated so removed
1947 Jan, Feb, Mar estimated for snow but total accepted so left.
1956 Jan 5.7, Feb 1.8, June 4.39, July 6.13 and total estimated and therefore removed
1960 Feb 3.29, Sept 5.97 and total estimated and removed
